page.title: 06Farming.
page.content: Mrs Lane and class 4 visted MacBrides farm. We went to vist a farm. First we looked at the goslings and the geese, the goslings were fluffy we stroked them.We saw sheep and they were fluffy too.We went near a tractor,and went on it.There were lots of buttons and levers to press,I pretended to drive it.We went in the milking shed where the cows get milked. We saw a box it was metal and there was creamy milk in it.We saw a heifer and there was one I liked best because it was funny. David Ventris_Field.
